tool_description: The News API is a web service that allows developers to access a vast collection of news articles from various sources worldwide. It provides a simple and efficient way to retrieve top headlines, breaking news, and trending news in JSON format. Developers can use the API to fetch news articles based on specific criteria, such as keywords, sources, language, country, and more.  With the News API, you can query for the latest news, get top headlines from various categories, and filter news base...
name: News API
title: News API

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: This is the route for handling the search functionality. It accepts query parameters such as lang, country, and query
